name: Asdivine Hearts
description: Restore the balance of light and shadow in the world!Beautiful hand-drawn visuals and a story of epic proportions bring Asdivine Hearts to the forefront of PC gaming! Travel alongside four companions and a cat in this fantasy 2D turn-based RPG!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista / 7 Processor: Intel® Celeron® Processor 2950M (2.00 GHz) Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo Processor E7400 (2.80 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A great 2D-JRPG that you can see alot of effort was but into the game. It's good to see that this isn't just some RPGMaker game, but a decent developed JRPG game. :)
felix the cat is a pretty cool dude, but unfortunately the game includes people who are not ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ cats which does tend to drag it down somewhat. 8 meowzers out of 10

This is what happens when you take a 5 hour game and stretch it into 30 hours.  Terribly repetitive. The combat, the locations, the lame jokes... You'll see and hear it all within the first 5 hours. Then it's recycled and thrown at you again and again and again. What a grinder.
